location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 320 x 350mm, on a sheet 360 x 470mm.

mods.abstract: Map showing the north-western area of Turkey, focused on the coastal areas on the Agean Sea, the Sea of Marmara, and the Black Sea. It was originally created by the Admiralty War Staff, and appears at folio 171 in A Handbook of Turkey in Europe.The map shows roads and tracks, railways and stations, and key towns and cities.
